mapper.update:
UPDATE user
id = #{id},
code = #{code},
loginName = #{loginName},
firstName = #{firstName},
lastName = #{lastName},
displayName = #{displayName},
password = #{password},
userId = #{userId},
datetime = #{datetime},
signature = #{signature},
status = #{status},
email = #{email},
language = #{language},
chineseName = #{chineseName},
departmentId = #{departmentId},
positionId = #{positionId},
personalPhoto = #{personalPhoto},
cardNo = #{cardNo},
badgenumber = #{badgenumber},

addUser = #{addUser},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
modifyIp = #{modifyIp},
modifyUser = #{modifyUser},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
